document_data.mainbody:
he Manticores Crossing was a crossing on the Way of the Manticore in Cormyr.It is actually unknown where and what Manticores Crossing is, but the name strongly suggests a crossroad or river ford on the Way of the Manticore, so this is assumed here.
It was the site of a battle between the army of King Galaghard III and the undead forces of the Witch Lords in the . The Cormyreans were victorious, but the undead would rise again.
